CalculatedMember.MdxString: CREATE MEMBER CURRENTCUBE.[Measures].[CSAT Survey Score AVG] AS [Measures].[Score]/[Measures].[CSAT Number Of Calls], FORMAT_STRING = "0", VISIBLE = 1 , ASSOCIATED_MEASURE_GROUP = 'CSAT Agent Survey' ;

CREATE MEMBER CURRENTCUBE.[Measures].[QA Quality Score AVG] AS ([Measures].[Quality Score Sum]/100)/[Measures].[QA Number Of Evaluations], FORMAT_STRING = "0%", VISIBLE = 1 , ASSOCIATED_MEASURE_GROUP = 'QA Agent Evaluation' ;
